attributes.action: The Government must honour David Cameron's decision to take 3000 child refugees.
attributes.additional_details: The statement was made by Robert Goodwill, Immigration Minister and the story was published by The Independant on 8th February 2017.
attributes.background: The Government has today announced in a written statement from the Home Office that it will not honour David Cameron's commitment to accept 3000 child refugees. This is an appalling betrayal of British values and basic decency alike and should not be allowed to stand.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
